welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Congleton, where historic charm meets modern flair! Get ready to experience our picturesque town, known for its quaint streets and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Congleton has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
